sense.def:
A habit
je nekaj, kar počnemo pogosto ali redno.

seg.quote: It became a habit for the fans to use the office.
More out of habit than anything else, I stopped and went in.

sense.def:
To be in the habit of doing something
ali
to make a habit of doing something
pomeni nekaj početi redno in pogosto.

seg.quote: Once a month Castle was in the habit of taking Sarah for an excursion.
They made a habit of lunching together twice a week.

sense.def:
A habit
je tudi dejanje, ki velja za nekaj slabega, vendar ga nekdo vztrajno ponavlja in se ga težko odvadi.

seg.quote: He had a nervous habit of biting his nails.

sense.def:
A drug habit
je zasvojenost z mamilom.

seg.quote: Groups exist to help those who want to kick the marijuana habit.
